definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
rose-tinted sky or clouds at sunrise or sunset

sentences.english: Wang Junxia is the record-holder of the long distance race.
sentences.chinese: 王軍霞是長跑的記錄保持者。

sentences.english: Wang junxia is taking her lap, holding the Five-Star Red Flag.
sentences.chinese: 王軍霞手裏拿着五星紅旗在繞跑道跑。

sentences.english: Wang Junxia is famous as a good runner.
sentences.chinese: 王軍霞是一位很著名的長跑運動員。
